Literature.Title: Rationale-based, de novo design of dehydrophenylalanine-containing antibiotic peptides and systematic modification in sequence for enhanced potency.
Literature.Author: Pathak S, Chauhan VS

Literature.Title: Antifungal activity of novel synthetic peptides by accumulation of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and disruption of cell wall against Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Maurya IK, Pathak S, Sharma M, Sanwal H, Chaudhary P, Tupe S, Deshpande M, Chauhan VS, Prasad R
